mapper.insert: insert into member (member_num, member_id, member_pwd, member_name, member_nick, member_sex, member_phone, member_email, member_addr, member_point, member_alarm, member_admin, social_num) values(nvl(max(MEMBER_NUM), 0)+1, #{member_id}, #{member_pwd}, #{member_name}, #{member_nick}, #{member_sex}, #{member_phone}, #{member_email}, #{member_addr}, 0, #{member_alarm}, #{member_admin}, #{social_num})
mapper.update: update member set member_id = #{member_id}, member_name = #{member_name}, member_nick = #{member_nick}, member_phone = #{member_phone}, member_email = #{member_email}, member_addr = #{member_addr}, member_point = #{member_point}, member_sms = #{member_sms}, member_admin = #{member_admin}, social_num = #{social_num} where member_num = #{member_num}
update member set member_pwd = #{member_pwd} where member_num = #{member_num}
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where member_nick = #{member_nick}
